title: Frontier: stories from white Australia's forgotten war: Part two: worse than slavery itself 1830-1860
brief_description: Humanitarians and missionaries begin an anti slavery plight on behalf of the Aborigines against the Crown. Despite their efforts however and a growth in national awareness, the massacres continue.
